rules_text:
[b][Draw two cards][/b], then discard two cards.
Impetus–{2}{R}, Discard two cards. [i](You may cast this from your graveyard as a sorcery with only the text in square brackets for its impetus cost. Then exile it.)[/i]
flavor_text:
